meanings.sent1: The archaeologists found many kylices during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of ancient kylices.
meanings.sent3: At the pottery class, they joked about using kylices as hats.
meanings.sent4: The kylices on the shelf whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The colorful kylices sparkled under the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: In the Greek history lesson, they discussed the significance of kylices.
meanings.sent2: The art students sketched various kylices in their drawings.
meanings.sent3: During the party, they used kylices as unique party favors.
meanings.sent4: The kylices in the painting symbolized unity and celebration.
meanings.sent5: The delicate kylices were carefully passed down through generations.
